PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: Knights of Lear's train, Captains, Messengers, Soldiers, and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. King Lear's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Sennet. Enter KING LEAR, CORNWALL, ALBANY,
GONERIL, REGAN, CORDELIA, and Attendants
Laying his hand on his sword

Flourish. Re-enter GLOUCESTER, with KING OF FRANCE,
BURGUNDY, and Attendants

Flourish. Exeunt all but KING OF FRANCE, GONERIL,
REGAN, and CORDELIA
Exeunt KING OF FRANCE and CORDELIA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The Earl of Gloucester's castle.
SCENE III. The Duke of Albany's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GONERIL, and OSWALD, her steward

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A hall in the same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Horns within. Enter KING LEAR, Knights, and
Attendants
Exeunt KING LEAR, KENT, and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Court before the same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING LEAR, KENT, and Fool

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. GLOUCESTER's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter EDMUND, and CURAN meets him
Enter GLOUCESTER, and Servants with torches

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Before Gloucester's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter EDMUND, with his rapier drawn, CORNWALL,
REGAN, GLOUCESTER, and Servants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: REGAN
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: KENT is put in the stocks

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt all but GLOUCESTER and KENT

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A wood.
SCENE IV. Before GLOUCESTER's castle. KENT in the stocks.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING LEAR, Fool, and Gentleman
Enter CORNWALL, REGAN, GLOUCESTER, and Servants
Exeunt KING LEAR, GLOUCESTER, KENT, and Fool

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A heath.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Storm still. Enter KENT and a Gentleman, meeting

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Another part of the heath. Storm still.
SCENE III. Gloucester's castle.
SCENE IV. The heath. Before a hovel.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING LEAR, KENT, and Fool
The Fool runs out from the hovel
Enter EDGAR disguised as a mad man

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Gloucester's castle.
SCENE VI. A chamber in a farmhouse adjoining the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GLOUCESTER, KING LEAR, KENT, Fool, and EDGAR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Gloucester's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter CORNWALL, REGAN, GONERIL, EDMUND, and Servants
Enter GLOUCESTER, brought in by two or three
Takes a sword, and runs at him behind

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The heath.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EDGAR
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter GLOUCESTER, led by an Old Man

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Before ALBANY's palace.
SCENE III. The French camp near Dover.
SCENE IV. The same. A tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter, with drum and colours, CORDELIA, Doctor, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Gloucester's castle.
SCENE VI. Fields near Dover.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GLOUCESTER, and EDGAR dressed like a peasant

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EDGAR
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter KING LEAR, fantastically dressed with wild flowers

SCENE.STAGEDIR: They fight, and EDGAR knocks him down

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. A tent in the French camp. LEAR on a bed asleep, soft music playing; Gentleman, and others attending.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt all but KENT and Gentleman

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The British camp, near Dover.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, with drum and colours, EDMUND, REGAN,
Gentlemen, and Soldiers.
EDMUND Know of the duke if his last purpose hold,
Or whether since he is advised by aught
To change the course: he's full of alteration
And self-reproving: bring his constant pleasure.
[To a Gentleman, who goes out
Enter, with drum and colours, ALBANY, GONERIL, and Soldiers
As they are going out, enter EDGAR disguised
Exeunt all but ALBANY and EDGAR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A field between the two camps.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarum and retreat within. Re-enter EDGAR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The British camp near Dover.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, in conquest, with drum and colours, EDMUND,
KING LEAR and CORDELIA, prisoners; Captain,
Soldiers, & c
Exeunt KING LEAR and CORDELIA, guarded

Flourish. Enter ALBANY, GONERIL, REGAN, another
Captain, and Soldiers

Enter EDGAR, at the third sound, armed, with a
trumpet before him
Enter a Gentleman, with a bloody knife
The bodies of GONERIL and REGAN are brought in

Re-enter KING LEAR, with CORDELIA dead in his arms;
EDGAR, Captain, and others following
